name: Running For President - 2016 US Election Satire
name_original: Running For President - 2016 US Election Satire
description:
Running For President is an action-packed arcade style game using simple, button controls. Begin your quest for the whitehouse in the caucus hall. Next, you need money - FAST! Run through America, collecting cash and briefcases full of special interest money. Avoid the supreme court. Do you have what it takes to be the next president?

Running For President is a satirical view of American politics and the insanity of the presidential election cycle. All candidates are lampooned. Nothing is sacred.

Game is intended for amusement purposes only. All characters are fictional. Any resemblance to actual people is purely coincidental. Have fun!

Voting is a right and privilege. Make democracy work by remembering to vote.

Maelstrom Interactive is an small, family company that develops educational software and a few indie-games. If you like Running For President, please give us a review on the iTunes app store. Thanks!
